entry.title: Tuesday night: Wet snow mixed with rain. Low plus 2.
entry.summary: Becoming cloudy this evening. Wet snow at times mixed with rain beginning late this evening. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light early this evening. Low plus 2. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PDT Tuesday 25 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Periods of rain. High 8. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of rain early in the morning. Clearing near noon. Wind becoming southwest 30 km/h gusting to 60 in the morning. High 8. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PDT Tuesday 25 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: A few clouds. Low minus 2.
entry.summary: Clear. Becoming partly cloudy near midnight. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 60 becoming light late in the evening. Low minus 2. Wind chill minus 4 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PDT Tuesday 25 April 2023
